root: ^If you look above, you will see four emotions associated with stress: sadness, happiness, anxiety, and anger.
^Stress has an effect on your emotions, and it can make you feel different emotions depending on the situation.
^Make sure to watch manage your emotions by keeping your stress levels controlled.
^Now let's learn how to practice mindful breathing. Mindful breathing helps you control your stress.
^To reduce your stress, long-press on the button with lungs on the right. The breath meter will then fill up. Once the meter fills, release the button reduce stress.
^Now press the breath button until you reduce your stress to less than ten.
